categories.title: ElizaOS Development Updates and Plugin Contributions

content.text:
### Technical Discussions & Decisions
- **Web3 Login Security**: Concerns were raised about Web3 login signing exposing private keys.
- **AI News Aggregator**: Configuration updates and Twitter activity data requests.
- **Plugin Management**: Suggestions for a streamlined plugin creation and management process.
- **Eliza Container Registry**: Made public for broader accessibility.
- **Launchpad Token Standards**: Ensuring compliance with Solana SPL standards.
- **Plugin Maintenance**: Identified the need for maintainers for certain repositories.
- **REST API Documentation**: Requests for improved documentation and Swagger support.
- **Plugin Registry Cleanup**: Addressing duplicate plugin entries.
- **Docker Issues**: Debugging build failures due to incorrect module paths.
- **Memory Management**: Discussions on handling message history.
- **Twitter Plugin Issues**: Reports of malfunctions and subsequent fixes.
- **RAG Knowledge Embedding**: Troubleshooting document ingestion issues.
- **V2 Migration**: Confirmation of migration requirements and an auto-migration tool.
- **Local AI Model Support**: Integration with Ollama API for local LLMs.

### Concrete Solutions & Implementations
- **Docker Fixes**: Revised Dockerfile to resolve module path issues.
- **Twitter Plugin Fix**: Correct plugin installation resolved issues.
- **Memory Deletion**: Implemented `runtime.messageManager.removeMemory` for memory management.
- **REST API Documentation**: Basic documentation page created.
- **Plugin Registry Update**: Cleanup of duplicate entries.
- **RAG System Fix**: Identified and resolved document ingestion issues.
- **Local AI Model Integration**: Provided environment variables for configuring Ollama.

### Plugin Registry Contributions
- **Adding Plugins**: Guidance on creating a separate repository and updating `index.json`.
- **Plugin Installation & Activation**: Instructions on installing and activating plugins.
- **Unreal Engine Plugin**: Development of a plugin for Unreal Engine integration.
- **Token Prediction Plugin**: Development and testing of a market prediction tool.
- **Tech-Support Bot**: Proposal for a bot focused on JavaScript, Bitcoin, and GitHub support.
- **AI Agent Platform**: Introduction of `aigent.sh`, an AI agent platform powered by ElizaOS.

### Action Items
#### Technical Tasks
1. **Fix Docker Build Issues**
2. **Resolve Twitter Plugin Issues**
3. **Improve Memory Management**
4. **Fix RAG Knowledge Embedding**
5. **Update Plugin Registry**

#### Documentation Needs
6. **REST API Documentation**
7. **V2 Migration Guide**
8. **Local AI Model Setup Guide**
9. **Multiple Agent Setup Guide**
10. **Twitter Bot Best Practices**

#### Feature Requests
11. **'Make a New Plugin' Flow**
12. **Multiple Plugin Install/Remove**
13. **Auto-Migration Tool for V2**
14. **Swagger API Documentation**
15. **Memory Deletion UI**

An out-of-memory (OOM) bug in Eliza OS (v0.25.8) was fixed by [v1xingyue] by modifying `splitChunks/splitText`. The issue was caused by a dead loop consuming all memory. [odilitime] confirmed the fix.

Broken links were reported in the official plugin registry after PR #95 was merged. [flaneurofmetaverses] raised the issue, and [odilitime] confirmed it was not due to their mistake and agreed to investigate.

[pravn1729] inquired about the removal of the plugin-kaia chain (PR #61). [odilitime] advised creating a personal repo and submitting a PR to the registry, confirming that GitHub is used for distribution instead of npm.

Enhancements were made to the Twitter plugin: [krustev.alexander] added a reflection mode for evaluating post appropriateness (PR #14), and [tadeuchi] added a callback to retrieve posted tweet info (PR #1) and submitted a PR to register a forked Twitter plugin (PR #108).

Several new plugins were submitted, including a Sonic Blockchain Plugin ([thopate_vijay], PR #97), an AIXecutor Plugin for AI-powered node validators ([teoloki], PR #103), a Mem0 AI SDK Provider ([whysosaket], PR #3927), a DexPaprika Price Fetcher ([0xmattsroka], PR #109), and a Distributed Storage Plugin ([fforbeck], PR #111).
[dtb0x] fixed a bug related to loading character plugins from remote URLs (PR #3890).
[dankvr] set up AI-news aggregation for multiple Discord channels and submitted a documentation update (PR #3772).
[hish1639] inquired about the version in which their merged PR (#3958) would be included, but no response was provided.

categories.title: ElizaOS Development Updates and Technical Discussions

content.text:
### Technical Discussions & Decisions
- **Web3 Login Security**: Concerns were raised about Web3 login signing exposing private keys.
- **AI News Aggregator**: Configuration updates and Twitter activity data requests were discussed.
- **Plugin Management**: A new plugin creation flow and multiple plugin install/remove features were proposed.
- **Eliza Container Registry**: The registry was made public.
- **Launchpad Token Standards**: Ensuring Solana SPL compliance for launched tokens was emphasized.
- **Plugin Maintenance**: The `plugin-di` repository needed a maintainer.
- **REST API Documentation**: Swagger support was requested.
- **Plugin Registry Cleanup**: Duplicate plugin entries were identified and a cleanup was proposed.
- **Docker Issues**: Debugging of build failures due to incorrect module paths.
- **Memory Management**: Discussions on Elizaâ€™s memory system and message history handling.
- **Twitter Plugin Issues**: Multiple reports of the Twitter client not functioning properly.
- **RAG Knowledge Embedding**: Issues with document ingestion and embedding were discussed.
- **V2 Migration**: Migration requirements and an auto-migration tool for plugins were confirmed.
- **Local AI Model Support**: The `plugin-local-ai` supports Ollama API for local LLMs.

### Concrete Solutions & Implementations
- **Docker Fixes**: A revised Dockerfile was proposed to resolve module path issues.
- **Twitter Plugin Fix**: Issues were resolved by installing the correct plugins.
- **Memory Deletion**: `runtime.messageManager.removeMemory` was confirmed as a method to delete memories.
- **REST API Documentation**: A basic documentation page was created.
- **Plugin Registry Update**: A PR was submitted to clean up duplicate plugin entries.
- **RAG System Fix**: The `eliza-news` folder was identified as causing document ingestion issues.
- **Local AI Model Integration**: Environment variables for configuring Ollama with Eliza were provided.

### Plugin Development & Enhancements
- **New Plugins**: Several new plugins were submitted, including a Sonic Blockchain Plugin, AIXecutor Plugin, Mem0 AI SDK Provider, DexPaprika Price Fetcher, and a Distributed Storage Plugin.
- **Bug Fixes**: A fix for loading character plugins from remote URLs was submitted.
- **Twitter Plugin Enhancements**: A reflection mode for evaluating post appropriateness and a callback for retrieving posted tweet info were added.
- **Plugin Registry Issues**: Broken links in the official plugin registry were reported and are under investigation.
- **Plugin-Kaia Chain Removal**: Guidance was provided on re-adding removed plugins via personal repositories.

### Action Items
#### **Technical Tasks**
1. **Fix Docker Build Issues**
2. **Resolve Twitter Plugin Issues**
3. **Improve Memory Management**
4. **Fix RAG Knowledge Embedding**
5. **Update Plugin Registry**
6. **Investigate and fix broken links in the plugin registry**
7. **Ensure OOM bug fix is stable in v0.25.8**
8. **Review and merge new plugin PRs**

#### **Documentation Needs**
9. **REST API Documentation**
10. **V2 Migration Guide**
11. **Local AI Model Setup Guide**
12. **Multiple Agent Setup Guide**
13. **Twitter Bot Best Practices**

#### **Feature Requests**
14. **'Make a New Plugin' Flow**
15. **Multiple Plugin Install/Remove**
16. **Auto-Migration Tool for V2**
17. **Swagger API Documentation**
18. **Memory Deletion UI**
